function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to contact with products in stores.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading diseases such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementing touchless or contactless systems for product testing and payment.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, touchless product testing technologies.","People":"Shoppers, store employees, and anyone in contact with the products.","Owner":"Retailers, store managers, and technology providers."},{"Description":"Psychological reactance leading to anti-social behavior such as increased touching of products.","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission and defiance of hygiene guidelines.","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of adhering to hygiene recommendations and creating a supportive shopping environment.","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, supportive store layouts.","People":"Consumers and store personnel.","Owner":"Public health organizations and retailers."},{"Description":"Increased waiting lines and congestion at store entrances due to limited capacity.","Impact":"Potential crowding, close contact, and longer exposure to others, increasing disease transmission risk.","Mitigation":"Implementing virtual queuing systems and occupancy management technologies.","Technologies":"Virtual queuing apps, occupancy monitoring sensors.","People":"Shoppers and store staff.","Owner":"Store managers and technology providers."}]}
